ProdigyAnswered on 28 Feb 2019You should avoid stocks of these types of companies -companies with low liquidity - stay away from companies with the daily average trading volume of fewer than 10 lacks.companies with high debts - avoid companies with high debts.companies with regularly falling stocks - it is never ever a good idea to invest in companies whose share prices are regularly falling.companies with low visibility - generally you can find all information related to company on the internet or financial sites. If you cannot find any such info, stay away from such companies.0 comments0
